Cmp3\String

Class String

public abstract class String

An abstract utility class to handle string manipulation.
All methods are statically available.

STATUS: beta - added mb_string support which is not well tested

Method Detail

NormalizeLinefeed

public static String NormalizeLinefeed(String $strString)

Replaces all linefeed variants LF, CR, CRLF to LF (chr(10))

Parameters

$strString -

RemoveRepeatingLinefeeds

public static String RemoveRepeatingLinefeeds(String $strString)

Replaces all repeating linefeeds with a single linefeed.
Spaces between two linefeeds will be ignored.

Parameters

$strString -

StripInvisible

public static String StripInvisible(mixed $strText)

Remove Invisible Characters
Every control character except newline (dec 10), carriage return (dec 13), and horizontal tab (dec 09) will be removed
A fixed space (160) will be replaced with a normal space

Parameters

$strText -

Returns the first character of a given string, or null if the given string is null.

Truncate

public static String Truncate(mixed $strText, integer $intMaxLength, String $strEllipses='...')

Truncates the string to a given length, adding elipses (if needed).
The shortened string is trimmed and the elipses are prepended: "abc..." The minimum length of the truncated string is 6

Parameters

$strText -
$intMaxLength -
$strEllipses -

TruncateSmart

public static String TruncateSmart(mixed $strText, integer $intMaxLength, String $strEllipses='...')

Truncates the string to a given length, adding elipses (if needed).
In comparison to Truncate() this function tries to cut at word boundaries.

Parameters

$strText -
$intMaxLength -
$strEllipses -

CommaList

public static String CommaList(String $strString)

Creates a clean comma list like value, value two, another, value, last
The passed string might have commas already and/or newlines.
Spaces will be fixed.

Parameters

$strString -

AnyToCamelCase

public static String AnyToCamelCase(String $strString, String $strPreserveCharacters=' \-_a-zA-Z0-9')

Takes UTF-8 data and tries to represent it in US-ASCII characters like Unidecode().
Also any character except " -_a-zA-Z0-9" will be removed.
Finally the string will be converted to CamelCase.

Parameters

$strString -
$strPreserveCharacters -

XmlEscape

public static String XmlEscape(String $strString)

Escapes the string so that it can be safely used in as an Xml Node (basically, adding CDATA if needed)
